customHTML.value:
[{"children":[{"text":""},{"text":"<!-- Check whether the end-user browser is supporting WebAuthn to understand if security keys and platform biomentic method are usable -->
<form id="webAuthenSupportForm" method="post">
    <input type="hidden" name="webAuthenSupport" id="webAuthenSupport">
    <button type="hidden" data-skcomponent="skbutton" data-skbuttontype="form-submit" class="hidden-button"  data-skbuttonvalue="submit" data-skform="webAuthenSupportForm" id="autoSubmit">Next</button>
</form>"}]}]

</form>

customHTML.value:
{{#if applicationName}} {{applicationName}}{{else}}Authentication {{/if}}

{{#ifEquals type "SMS"}} Message sent to {{deviceName}} ({{phone}})
Enter the passcode you received. {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "VOICE"}} Calling {{deviceName}}({{phone}})
Enter the passcode you received. {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "EMAIL"}} Email sent to {{deviceName}} ({{email}})
Enter the passcode you received. {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "PINGID_MOBILE"}} Authenticating with {{deviceName}}
Use the PingID app to get the passcode and enter it here to authenticate {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "TOTP"}} Authenticating with {{deviceName}}
Enter the passcode displayed in your authenticator. {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "PINGID_DESKTOP"}} Authenticating with {{deviceName}}
Enter the passcode displayed in PingID desktop. {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "OATH_TOKEN"}} {{#ifEquals authenticationStatus "EXTRA_OTP_REQUIRED"}} Final step
Let's make sure your token is working correctly. Wait for a new passcode to display on your token and enter it here. {{else}} Authenticating with {{deviceName}}
Enter the passcode displayed on your token. {{/ifEquals}} {{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "YUBIKEY"}} Authenticating with {{deviceName}}
Insert your Yubikey and press the button, or tap it, to authenticate.

{{/ifEquals}}

Call again

Resend passcode

Resend passcode
{{/ifEquals}}

annotation.value: This flow does FIDO, OTP, Push, and Back up device
Waiting for user interaction on the mobile device
User approved the authentication on the mobile device
Waiting for user interaction on the mobile device
User did not respond to the push notification

PingID - MFA Authentication Sub-Flow                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Created by: Ping Identity                                                                                                  Version: 1.2                                                                                                     Release Date: April 2025                                          Documentation: https://support.pingidentity.com/s/marketplace-integration/a7iDo0000010xbXIAQ/pingid-authentication
Check if there are missing mandatory methods
Check session and match to current user

fields.displayName: When true a push timeout flow should continue to an OTP page
When 'true' and no devices goes to registration
Defines the authentication action the user should preform
local device ID variable to manage the most current user device being used
If empty the settings button will not display
When empty the url will be to my-account page
When true the 'Use Code' button will be displayed during a mobile app authentication

select method (with MOBILE) - meirav
sktemplate.template:
Select Method

Select the authentication method you want to pair with your account
{{#each applications as | application |}}
{{name}}
Use {{name}} to receive push notifications.
{{/each}} {{#each allowedTypes as | type |}} {{#ifEquals type "PLATFORM"}}
Biometrics
Use a fingerprint or facial scan to authenticate.
{{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "TOTP"}}
Authenticator App
Use an authenticator app (like Google) to authenticate.
{{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "SMS"}}
Text Message
Receive a text message with a passcode to authenticate.
{{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "VOICE"}}
Voice
Receive a phone call with a passcode to authenticate.
{{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "EMAIL"}}
Email
Receive an email with a passcode to authenticate.
{{/ifEquals}} {{#ifEquals type "SECURITY_KEY"}}
Security Key
Use a security key to authenticate.
{{/ifEquals}} {{/each}}
Cancel

rules.message: The phone number you entered isn't valid. Try again.

customHTML.value:
<!-- Check whether the end-user browser is supporting WebAuthn to understand if security keys and platform biomentic method are usable -->
<form id="webAuthenSupportForm" method="post">
    <input type="hidden" name="webAuthenSupport" id="webAuthenSupport">
    <button type="hidden" data-skcomponent="skbutton" data-skbuttontype="form-submit" class="hidden-button"  data-skbuttonvalue="submit" data-skform="webAuthenSupportForm" id="autoSubmit">Next</button>
</form>

sktemplate.name: Browser computability check - meirav

</form>
